Topic.Title: @$9.18 is DELL quietly going out of business?

Message.Msg: Would seem to be the scenario that Private Equity seeks out-- the sum of the parts are worth more than the whole, Market Cap @16B, Cash @13B, Acquistions Reported Value @10B (at 50c on the dollar = 5B).

Topic.Title: @$9.18 is DELL quietly going out of business?
